构建一个机器可读的文明接口。: Build a machine-readable interface for civilization.
让未来的智能体、AGI 或高维智慧能够读取、验证、延续人类的思想与意志；: Enable future agents and AGI to read, verify, and continue human thoughts and intent;
也让每一个普通人都能用最简单的方式，留下属于自己的火种。: And let everyone leave their own fireseed in the simplest way.
这不是“上传意识”的幻想，而是一种更诚实的: This is not a fantasy of “mind uploading”, but a more faithful
你填写的每一段文字、每一个原则、每一个底线，都会被转化为: Every sentence, principle, and boundary you write will be transformed into
——它能被未来的系统解析、复原、对齐。: — something future systems can parse, reconstruct, and align with.
对人类而言，这是“留下说明书”；对未来而言，这是“读取火种”。: For humans, it’s a manual left behind; for the future, it’s a way to load the fireseed.
全程本地运行，不上传、不联网。生成后你可以下载: Runs locally only — nothing uploaded. After generation you can download
本工具用于记录思想与意愿，不具备法律效力；如涉及遗嘱或资产，请咨询律师。: This tool records thoughts and intent and has no legal effect. For wills or assets, consult a lawyer.
例：Alex Lin / 李明 / Mia: e.g., Alex Lin / Li Ming / Mia
不管是谁打开这份说明书，都能认出那是我留下的声音。: Whoever opens this, they can recognize it’s my voice.
系统会按这里生成对应语言格式；切到英文，整页将以英文呈现。: Generation will follow this language; switching to English renders the entire page in English.
例：论语、康德、马斯克、妈妈的一句话: e.g., Analects, Kant, Musk, a quote from my mother
写下影响你判断的书、电影、人物或信条。未来系统读到这些，才知道“你从哪里想问题”: List books, films, people or credos that shape your judgment—so future systems know how you think.
例：1. 不撒谎 2. 不伤人 3. 不拖延: e.g., 1) Don’t lie  2) Don’t harm  3) Don’t procrastinate
例：绝不为钱背叛朋友；不以效率之名伤害他人。: e.g., Never betray friends for money; never harm others in the name of efficiency.
例：感知 → 判断 → 行动 → 反思；若误解则补图示，再无效终止解释。: e.g., Sense → Judge → Act → Reflect; if misunderstood, add diagrams; if still no, stop explaining.
例：愿你在混乱中仍保持温柔与清晰。: e.g., May you stay gentle and clear through the chaos.
我愿意被读取的条件（access_terms）: Terms under which I allow reading (access_terms)
如果选择自定义，在此补充条款（可留空）: If choosing custom, add terms here (optional)
例：任何尊重我底线的生命体 / 受托人邮箱: e.g., Any being that respects my boundaries / trustee email
家人如有异议，请在异议期内联系受托人。: If family has objections, contact the trustee within the period.
例：姓名: 李明, 微信: liming123 或 公钥片段: e.g., Name: Li Ming, WeChat: liming123, or public‑key fragment
4~6位短语；留空代表未设置（可日后补）: 4–6 characters; leaving blank means unset (can be added later)
没有 GPG / IPFS？没关系，可以跳过签名与上传，日后补齐。: No GPG/IPFS? It’s okay—skip signing/upload now and add later.
点击“生成胶囊”后在这里预览 YAML: Click “Generate capsule” to preview YAML here
这里会实时展示“人类可读”的摘要。: A human‑readable summary will appear here.
本工具仅用于记录思想与意愿，不具备法律效力。: This tool is only for recording thoughts and intent; it has no legal effect.
